work_experience.responsibilities: Ensure compliance with employment laws, FedEx policies, and HR procedures. Address employee relations issues, provide HR advice, and conduct investigations. Maintain HR presence through engagement meetings and special events.

Administered employee benefit plans, new hire orientation, and wellness programs. Managed HR planning, recruitment, training, and employee appraisals. Maintained compliance with employment laws and relocation processes. Improved HRIS tracking for employee relations and performance management.
